DataGrasper module¶

Created on Mon May 25 16:08:38 2020

@author: chenwang THC_summary_V2 :compare to V1, No need export csv from Lv0 report website. Now script scraping information from website based runid.

input = runids from a txt file ‘runidlist.txt’ , including runs we want extract information. output = One excel with all information from THC. ==> this goes to PowerBI for visualisation.

careful

error if run have no Lv0 report. error if run have no THC table. better to create some kind of checking function.

Update from V2.1 : output method upgraded to xlsxwriter, doing ‘format as table’ for PowerBI Update from V2.2 : remove duplicated run ids, add unit for criterias.
